Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Combine the egg, water, ground beef, bread crumbs, salt, and black pepper in a bowl, mixing thoroughly to form bite-size meatballs. Transfer the meatballs to a large baking dish.
Cook the meatballs until they are browned and cooked through, typically about 25-30 minutes.
